TOAST.DESTRUCTIVE: I am an error notification. Please resolve something already.
TOAST.DONE: I am a success notification. Everything is fine, but don't mess up.
TOAST.WARNING: I am a warning notification. Just take note.
TOAST.UPDATE_TELEGRAM: This method is not supported in the current version of Telegram. Please update the app to the latest version.

OFFLINE_BONUS.TITLE: Offline Bonus
OFFLINE_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Come back every 3 hours to earn profit! You can buy a Booster to increase the offline bonus period.

DISCONNECT_MODAL.TITLE: Log Out
DISCONNECT_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: The wallet will be completely removed from the app
DISCONNECT_MODAL.AGGREEMENT: I understand that after disconnecting the wallet, all its data will be deleted from the app.

CHECK_ASSIGNMENTS.CHECK_ASSIGNMENTS: Click below to submit it for verification.

CONFIRMATION_MODAL.TITLE: Make Sure You Have Completed the Task
CONFIRMATION_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: If we see that you have not met the task requirements (you must be subscribed to the channel for at least 5 days), we will deduct double the amount of coins.

MODAL.TITLE: Buy Friends
MODAL.DESCRIPTION: You can get friends who will bring you passive income.

ERRORS.BUY_FRIENDS: An error occurred while buying friends.

PREMIUM.TITLE: Premium Boosters
PREMIUM.MULTIPLE_TEMP_ENERGY: Temporary Increase in Maximum Energy by {amount} times
